Posts.EditableText: On the home page of the text adventurers web site, cover art gets cropped. I appreciate there is not room to show 512x512, but would it not be better to keep the proportions the same? Or allow for another image to be uploaded that is the right size for that page, giving the author full control over how his or her art is displayed?
